languages.text: {n}После недолгой паузы она неловко продолжает:{/n} "Так вот... Дело, которое я хотела с вами обсудить, касается моего промысла. Вы знаете, я продаю заинтересованным имперцам артефакты ксеносов, а ксеносам — побрякушки имперцев. Дела идут неплохо, сеть налажена — функционирует и без моего вмешательства. Но вот расшириться — расшириться у меня никак не выходит".

traits.locale_text: {n}После недолгой паузы она неловко продолжает:{/n} "Так вот... Дело, которое я хотела с вами обсудить, касается моего промысла. Вы знаете, я продаю заинтересованным имперцам артефакты маадари, а маадари — побрякушки имперцев. Дела идут неплохо, сеть налажена — функционирует и без моего вмешательства. Но вот расшириться — расшириться у меня никак не выходит".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}After a brief pause, she awkwardly continues,{/n} "So... The matter I wanted to discuss with you is related to my business. You know that I sell xeno-artefacts to interested Imperial subjects, and Imperial trinkets to xenos. Business is going well, my network runs even without my participation. But when it comes to expansion... well, that is where I hit a wall."

Но вот расшириться — расшириться у меня никак не выходит".

You know that I sell xeno-artefacts to interested Imperial subjects, and Imperial trinkets to xenos. Business is going well, my network runs even without my participation. But when it comes to expansion... well, that is where I hit a wall."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊短暂地停顿片刻，之后尴尬地继续开了口。{/n}“这么说吧……我想和你讨论的事情，与我的生意有关。如你所知，我向感兴趣的帝国臣民出售异形造物，向异形出售帝国的小玩意儿。我的生意一直做得很好，就算我不亲自插手，贸易网也运行得很顺利。不过如果我想扩大规模的话……这么说吧，问题就来了。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief pause, she awkwardly continues,{/n} "So... The matter I wanted to discuss with you is related to my business. You know that I sell xeno-artefacts to interested Imperial subjects, and Imperial trinkets to xenos. Business is going well, my network runs even without my participation. But when it comes to expansion... well, that is where I hit a wall."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊短暂地停顿片刻，之后尴尬地继续开了口。{/n}“这么说吧……我想和你讨论的事情，与我的生意有关。如你所知，我向感兴趣的帝国臣民出售异形造物，向异形出售帝国的小玩意儿。我的生意一直做得很好，就算我不亲自插手，贸易网也运行得很顺利。不过如果我想扩大规模的话……这么说吧，问题就来了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras una breve pausa, continúa, incómoda.{/n} «Bueno... Lo que quería hablar con usted está relacionado con mi negocio. Ya sabe que vendo artefactos xenos a súbditos del Imperium interesados en ellos y también creaciones imperiales a los xenos. El negocio va bien; mi red funciona incluso sin mi presencia. Pero, en lo que se refiere a la expansión... ahí es donde soy incapaz de progresar».
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief pause, she awkwardly continues,{/n} "So... The matter I wanted to discuss with you is related to my business. You know that I sell xeno-artefacts to interested Imperial subjects, and Imperial trinkets to xenos. Business is going well, my network runs even without my participation. But when it comes to expansion... well, that is where I hit a wall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras una breve pausa, continúa, incómoda.{/n} «Bueno... Lo que quería hablar con usted está relacionado con mi negocio. Ya sabe que vendo artefactos xenos a súbditos del Imperium interesados en ellos y también creaciones imperiales a los xenos. El negocio va bien; mi red funciona incluso sin mi presencia. Pero, en lo que se refiere a la expansión... ahí es donde soy incapaz de progresar».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}少し間をおいてから、ジェイは気まずそうに続ける。{/n}「それで…話したいことってのは、あたしの仕事の件なの。異種族のアーティファクトを興味津々な帝国の家臣に、帝国のアクセサリを異種族に売りさばいているのは知ってるでしょう。ビジネスは順調だし、商売網はあたしがいなくても動くわ。でも、手を広げていく上で…その、壁にぶつかってるのよ」
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief pause, she awkwardly continues,{/n} "So... The matter I wanted to discuss with you is related to my business. You know that I sell xeno-artefacts to interested Imperial subjects, and Imperial trinkets to xenos. Business is going well, my network runs even without my participation. But when it comes to expansion... well, that is where I hit a wall."

traits.locale_text: {n}少し間をおいてから、ジェイは気まずそうに続ける。{/n}「それで…話したいことってのは、あたしの仕事の件なの。異種族のアーティファクトを興味津々な帝国の家臣に、帝国のアクセサリを異種族に売りさばいているのは知ってるでしょう。ビジネスは順調だし、商売網はあたしがいなくても動くわ。でも、手を広げていく上で…その、壁にぶつかってるのよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après une courte pause, elle reprend d'un air gêné :{/n} « Alors, voilà... Je voulais vous parler d'un problème lié à mon fonds de commerce. Vous savez que je vends des xéno-artefacts aux sujets impériaux qui en sont friands, et inversement. Les affaires tournent bien et mon réseau fonctionne en toute autonomie, sans que j'aie besoin d'intervenir personnellement. Mais pour ce qui est de le développer... ma foi, je suis dans une impasse. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief pause, she awkwardly continues,{/n} "So... The matter I wanted to discuss with you is related to my business. You know that I sell xeno-artefacts to interested Imperial subjects, and Imperial trinkets to xenos. Business is going well, my network runs even without my participation. But when it comes to expansion... well, that is where I hit a wall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après une courte pause, elle reprend d'un air gêné :{/n} « Alors, voilà... Je voulais vous parler d'un problème lié à mon fonds de commerce. Vous savez que je vends des xéno-artefacts aux sujets impériaux qui en sont friands, et inversement. Les affaires tournent bien et mon réseau fonctionne en toute autonomie, sans que j'aie besoin d'intervenir personnellement. Mais pour ce qui est de le développer... ma foi, je suis dans une impasse. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach einer kurzen Pause fährt sie leicht verlegen fort:{/n} "Also ... was ich mit Euch besprechen wollte, hat etwas mit meinem Geschäft zu tun. Ihr wisst, ich verkaufe Xeno-Artefakte an interessierte imperiale Untertanen und imperialen Schmuck an Xenos. Das Geschäft läuft gut, und mein Netzwerk läuft auch ohne mein Zutun. Aber sobald es um Expansion geht ... laufe ich gegen eine Wand."
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief pause, she awkwardly continues,{/n} "So... The matter I wanted to discuss with you is related to my business. You know that I sell xeno-artefacts to interested Imperial subjects, and Imperial trinkets to xenos. Business is going well, my network runs even without my participation. But when it comes to expansion... well, that is where I hit a wall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer kurzen Pause fährt sie leicht verlegen fort:{/n} "Also ... was ich mit Euch besprechen wollte, hat etwas mit meinem Geschäft zu tun. Ihr wisst, ich verkaufe Xeno-Artefakte an interessierte imperiale Untertanen und imperialen Schmuck an Xenos. Das Geschäft läuft gut, und mein Netzwerk läuft auch ohne mein Zutun. Aber sobald es um Expansion geht ... laufe ich gegen eine Wand."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kısa bir sessizliğin ardından Jae, mahcup bir şekilde lafına devam ediyor.{/n} "Neyse... Seninle asıl işlerimle alakalı konuşmak istiyorum. Bildiğin üzere ilgilenen İmparatorluk tebaasına zeno eserleri, zenolaraysa İmparatorluk ıvır zıvırları satıyorum. İşler iyi; kurduğum ağ, benim müdahalem olmaksızın iş yapıyor. Konu genişlemeye gelinceyse... İşte o noktada duvara tosladım."
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief pause, she awkwardly continues,{/n} "So... The matter I wanted to discuss with you is related to my business. You know that I sell xeno-artefacts to interested Imperial subjects, and Imperial trinkets to xenos. Business is going well, my network runs even without my participation. But when it comes to expansion... well, that is where I hit a wall."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kısa bir sessizliğin ardından Jae, mahcup bir şekilde lafına devam ediyor.{/n} "Neyse... Seninle asıl tartışmak istediğim mesele, işlerimle alakalı. Bildiğin üzere, ilgilenen İmparatorluk tebaasına zeno eserleri, zenolaraysa İmparatorluk ıvır zıvırları satıyorum. İşler iyi; kurduğum ağ, benim müdahalem olmaksızın tıkırında gidiyor. Konu işi genişletmeye gelinceyse... İşte o noktada duvara tosladım."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
